actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to eliminate the authority of the Federal Communications Commission to regulate the franchise fee which a State, political subdivision, or other governmental entity may impose in connection with any franchise for cable television.

summary.text: Eliminates the authority of the Federal Communications Commission or any other Federal agency to regulate the franchise fee or tax which a State or local government may impose for cable television franchises.

titles.title: A bill to eliminate the authority of the Federal Communications Commission to regulate the franchise fee which a State, political subdivision, or other governmental entity may impose in connection with any franchise for cable television.
